According to §61.57(b)(1), no person may act as pilot in command of an aircraft carrying passengers during the period _beginning 1 hour after sunset and ending 1 hour before sunrise_, unless within the preceding 90 days that person has made at least three takeoffs and three landings **to a full stop** during the period beginning 1 hour after sunset and ending 1 hour before sunrise.

(14 CFR §61.57)
